cmd.name: [[12973443]]T@heocracy[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12981945]]First Darkling upgrade. \n\n Allows Dark Mages to forge buildings for resource collection and defence away from the Darkling Town Hall and allows the training of first level units in your colonies.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12990625]]Di@vine Arts[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13005377]]Second Darkling upgrade. \n\n Enables the development of additional Darkling units, buildings and upgrades.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13017578]]Divine T@ouch[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13026605]]Third Darkling upgrade. \n\n Allows the training of second level units in your colonies and enables the development of additional Darkling units, buildings and upgrades.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13030518]]Soul @Bond[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13047470]]Increases the limit of your Soulwatchers by one. Soulwatchers are automatically born at your Keep, each providing #GetClassInt('Darkling_SoulWatcher', 'support_points')# population.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13056394]]Spirit @Chains[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13069358]]Increases the lifetime of Gold Spirits to #GetClassInt('Darkling_GoldSpirit', 'spirit_bond_lifetime') / 1000# seconds and that of Spirits to #GetClassInt('Darkling_Spirit', 'spirit_bond_lifetime') / 1000# seconds.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13078158]]@Upgrade to Battle Shrine[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13086647]]Allows the training of Apostles of Death, deadly invisible assasins adept at dealing with swarms of small units.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13099370]]@Raise Spirits[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13100590]]Provides Dark Mages with the ability to raise Spirits from the bodies of fallen units. Spirits are summoned units with a limited lifetime.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13137967]]Upgrade to @Ember Spire[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13143550]]The Ember Tower deals #GetClassInt('Darkling_TowerUpgrade_Ember', 'ember_damagepersecond')# damage per second to all enemies in its sight.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13153000]]Upgrade to @Magma Spire[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13160287]]The Magma Tower thrusts scorching rocks at nearby enemies. Can attack air units.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13174496]]Upgrade to @Crystal Spire[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13183826]]Enables the Spire to collect gems from the nearest gem deposit.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13196342]]Sacred @War[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13204537]]Returns half the gold cost of Disciples and Fanatics to your treasury when they fall in battle.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13219374]]@Strength of Faith[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13222082]]Increases the Disciples' health by #GetClassInt('Darkling_Disciple', 'strengthoffaith_bonus')#.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13232170]]@Thundercall[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13248433]]Provides Disciples with a chance to cast thunderbolts upon their enemies with the help of their battle prayers. Each thunderbolt takes #GetClassInt('Darkling_Disciple', 'thundercall_damage')#% of the target's health points.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13259436]]Aether @Blade[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13269346]]Enhances the Apostle of Death's weapon allowing him to deprive an enemy unit from its energy as well as deal #GetClassInt('Darkling_ApostleOfDeath', 'aether_blade_damage')# damage per attack. In additionaly makes them stronger.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13274577]]A@fterlife[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13286022]]Allows the Apostle of Death's ethereal body to remain after his death for #GetClassInt('Darkling_ApostleOfDeath', 'afterlife_timeout') / 1000# seconds, dealing #GetClassInt('Darkling_ApostleOfDeath', 'afterlife_damage')# damage per second to all nearby enemies, In additionaly adding them a small amount of hp.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13298244]]@Nightweb[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13306003]]Enables the Dark Rider to redirect healing energy from enemy healers to himself. Also substantially increases his regeneration rate. In additionaly makes them stronger.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13319579]]@Fear Strike[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13328080]]Provides Dark Riders with the ability to stun their enemies with the first attack.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13330358]]@Meditation[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13346232]]Increases the regeneration rate of all Darkling units.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13355654]]@Nightfall[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13360550]]Upgrades the Temple of Nightfall to restore the health of all nearby units.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13372649]]Divine @Enlightment[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13386856]]Decreases the cost of units trained in your colonies by #GetClassInt('Darkling_Townhall', 'divineenlightment_rebate')#%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13390968]]Gold @Flow[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13409329]]Increases the Gold production of your Purifiers by #GetConst('DarklingGoldFlowBonus')#%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13415048]]@Crystal Rainfall[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13425713]]Increases the speed of Gem extraction by #GetConst('DarklingCrystalRainfallBonus')#%.[[]]

cmd.name: [[13111191]]@Evacuation[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[13120771]]Enables the Evacuate mode of Stoneshapers. In this mode, the Meteors envelop dying units and teleport them back to your base. In additionaly it makes him stronger.[[]]

cmd.name: [[berserk]]@Unholy Division[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[berserk1]]Makes fanatics more vicious by adding them #GetClassInt('Darkling_Fanatic', 'berserk_health_bonus')# health points and #GetClassInt('Darkling_Fanatic', 'berserk_armor_bonus')# armor.[[]]

cmd.name: [[HellRaisedWeapons]]@Hellraised weapons[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[HellRaisedWeapons1]]Adding #GetClassInt('Darkling_Townhall', 'hellraisedweapons_bonus_damage')#% amount of damage and #GetClassInt('Darkling_Townhall', 'hellraisedweapons_bonus_attackspeed')#% attack speed to the following units: Dark Rider, Fanatic, Disciple and Apostle of Death.[[]]

cmd.name: [[UnholyStrength]]@Unholy Armor[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[UnholyStrength1]]Adds a small amount of armor to the following units: Cannoneer, Dark Rider, Dark Mage.[[]]
